body:
Do you think it is ok that when people are swearing in chat I tell them please watch your language. But a lot of the time players will start to say 99250 don't do a Moderator's job you suck up, your a noob, you suck. When players start to do that does that count as bullying? 

Me: "Please don't swear!"
Random noob: "Stop doing a Moderators job!!!onee!1! It's a bannable offense!!!
body_tagged:

Me: "Please don't swear!"
Random noob: "Stop doing a Moderators job!!!onee!1! It's a bannable offense!!!
title: Do you think this is ok?

replies.body:
I think it is

One member in particular, yoshicole, was nice when i met him. Now he is a total ass swearing people out randomly, etc. It was like his maturity dropped (IM NOT calling out)
replies.body_tagged:
I think it is

replies.body: I hate it when someone is cursing or something then I tell them to watch their language and they start hating on me saying stuff like "dude you're not a moderator don't tell us what to do." I just hate people like that.
replies.body_tagged: I hate it when someone is cursing or something then I tell them to watch their language and they start hating on me saying stuff like "dude you're not a moderator don't tell us what to do." I just hate people like that.

replies.body:
This is definitely allowed, in my opinion.
Although you are not a moderator, you are still allowed to tell the rules to players, as it decreases their chance of being banned.
Keep up what you are doing, it is definitely not bannable.
http://www.avicus.net/rules
replies.body_tagged:
This is definitely allowed, in my opinion.
Although you are not a moderator, you are still allowed to tell the rules to players, as it decreases their chance of being banned.
Keep up what you are doing, it is definitely not bannable.
http://www.avicus.net/rules

replies.body:
In addition to what I said, it states in number 7 of Section A in the rules:
If you are not a staff member, do not impersonate or act as if you are a member of the Avicus staff.

However, this simply means that you cannot say that you are a member, but I would think that it is encouraged to stop rule breakers.
replies.body_tagged:

replies.body:
99, you're doing a great job at warning players. If I were you, I wouldn't stop (therefore it's allowed).

I'll remove the images as they contain foul language and vulgarity.

replies.body:
Hell no.

Why would it be allowed xD? They were bullying you when they made fun of your name.

EDIT:
OOHHHHHHH. I thought you asked if them swearing at you like that was allowed :P
Telling them to stop is allowed, as jozz said.

replies.body: There can't always be a staff on, so helping the server by telling people to not cuss or whatever in my opinion is allowed, as Jozz said. I try to do this and don't worry your not the only one who gets hate messages back xD They just don't like being called out.

replies.body:
Im only fine with it if you are trying to help the community out.
I get off when people try to do it just for mod(Mod tryhards)

replies.body: In my opinion, I think it's great what you're doing! It's great that a player can always remind another player if he/she breaks a rule, if they're unaware! Keep it up!<3
